name: Legend
description: A legend component for BitQuery VA-App: zoom and filter. Creates interactive legends which enable to filter and project certain parts of data according to various parameters. Legend types: Clusters, Licences, Task views, Layout settings, Control legend.
author: Svetlana Bykovskaya <bykovskaya.svetlana@gmail.com>, Lukas Borke <lukas@borke.net>
